<record_update table="x_snc_amazon_echo_intent">
    <x_snc_amazon_echo_intent action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <active>false</active>
        <always_available>false</always_available>
        <category/>
        <fallback>false</fallback>
        <intent_ends_session>false</intent_ends_session>
        <keyword>CreateIncident</keyword>
        <name>Create an Incident (Create)</name>
        <next_intent/>
        <order/>
        <output_speech_format/>
        <reprompt_speech_format/>
        <script><![CDATA[(function(content, attributes, erb){
	var issueText = content.Description.value;
	var userName = attributes.UserAttributes.name;
	
	var inc = new GlideRecord('incident');
	inc.initialize();
	inc.short_description = issueText;
	inc.description = "Opened by: " + userName + "\n" + issueText;
	inc.contact_type = "Alexa";
	var id = inc.insert();
	
	var incRec = new GlideRecord('incident');
	incRec.get(id);
	var number = incRec.number;
	
	var num = number.toString();
	var numS = num.slice(-7);
	
	var incNum = "<say-as interpret-as='spell-out'>" + "INC" + "</say-as> <say-as interpret-as='digits'>" + numS + "</say-as>";
	
	var ssml = "<speak>";
	ssml += "Your incident has been created. Here is your confirmation number: " + incNum;
	//ssml += "<say-as interpret-as='digits'>" + number +"</say-as>.";
	ssml += "</speak>";
	
	erb.setOutputSpeech("SSML", null, ssml);
	//erb.setReprompt("PlainText", "I didn't catch that. Tell me your issue by saying 'My issue is...' followed by your issue.", "");
	erb.setEnd(true);
	result = erb.response;
})(content, attributes, new EchoResponseBuilder());]]></script>
